= supported Controllers =
Here u find a list of supported controllers. By clicking the boards you get to the documentation.

  * 32 Bit and 64 Bit PC-linux
  * MICA2 Board (atmega128)
  * Charon2 (atmega128)
  * ArduinoMega (atmega1280)
  * NGW100
  * STK1000
  * EVK1100
  * EVK1104 [http://code.google.com/p/bajos/wiki/EVK1104 EVK1104]
  * XPLAIN- board
